title: Year Calender

comments.body:
Odd sem - 2nd week of August  to last week of dec 
Even sem- 2nd week of jan to last week of may.
June and july is the summer vaction
For odd sem esa ends usually around 22nd or 24th dec , from 25th dec to 1st week of jan is winter vacation.
This is the approx ranges of even and odd semesters, it may vary Â± 1 week

Adding to this, College Fests :   
1. Maaya - EC Campus Techno-cultural fest

2. Aatmatrisha (AT) - RR Campus techno Cultural fest.

​

Two biggest annual fests in PES

Generally - 

Maaya - Now  (i.e octboer - November )

AT - April

Adding to this, fests that also happen but haven't returned since COVID - 

1. The Amateur Scientist - national level fest aimed at school kids, gets a footfall of 10k+ every year from across the country. Usually happens August and is organised by 2nd years. Infamous for being the Tinder of PESU. 

2. Epsilon - intra college science fest, organised by first years. Happens in March

3. Prakalpa - Inter department (and intra too) project exhibition. Usually held in Feb. 

My batch (2022 outgoing) was the last to have these 3.
